medium: Porcelain with pink luster and black transfer decoration
title: Teapot, from Architects' Tea Set
description: short ovoid form pot with handle and spout attached to short sides; lid has copper luster bird for handle; one side of pot decorated with image of the Federal Hall, New York; opposite side has eagle from U.S. seal
creditline: Gift of Christopher Monkhouse in honor of Judy and Kenneth Dayton and their support of architecture in the Twin Cities
